tool_description: Get a Risk Score for a IP or Domain
name: SecurityRatings
title: SecurityRatings

api_list.name: Score Domain
api_list.description: Get Risk Score for a Domain. This is calculated in Real-Time based on the current status of the Domain.

api_list.name: Score IP
api_list.description: Get Risk Score for a IP Address, based on data gathered during the last month by Binaryedge. It will not run a scan targeting the specified IP.
